<div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/NewsMediaOrganization"><meta itemprop="name" content="birminghammail"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/"><div itemprop="logo" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/trinity-images/logos/birminghammail.png"><meta itemprop="width" content="162"><meta itemprop="height" content="60"></div></div><meta itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" content="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/greek-island-24-residents-set-16661114"><article class="article-main channel-news" data-mod="articleSso,converse,horizontalSwipe,trackScrollDepth,affiliatetext" data-url="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/greek-island-24-residents-set-16661114" data-converse><div class="article-type publication-font"><a class="channel-name section-theme-highlight" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/" data-link-tracking="TopArticle|MainTag|News">News</a></div><h1 class="section-theme-background-indicator publication-font" itemprop="headline name">The Greek island with 24 residents set to pay Brit families to live there</h1><p class="sub-title" itemprop="description">Situated between Crete and Kythira, the island has a dwindling population with only 24 residents</p><div class="byline"><div class="sharebar" data-share-image="https://i2-prod.chroniclelive.co.uk/incoming/article16524975.ece/ALTERNATES/s1200/0_Crystal-clear-turquoise-sea-water-of-Kolymbithres-beach-Paros-island-Greece.jpg" data-share-url="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/greek-island-24-residents-set-16661114" data-context="share-bar-16661114" data-friendly-name="Share Bar Link Click" class="article-body" itemprop="articleBody"><form class="skinny-signup skinny-signup-top publication-theme-border publication-theme-background-with-transparency" data-mod="skinnySignup" data-json="{&quot;mailingListId&quot;:&quot;36512&quot;,&quot;displayName&quot;:&quot;daily&quot;,&quot;contentId&quot;:9937691,&quot;endpointUrl&quot;:&quot;https://comm-proxy.tm-awx.com/api/publications/birminghammail/subscriptions/&quot;}"><span class="skinny-header">Get the biggest <u class="name">daily</u> stories by email</span><div class="skinny-form"><input type="text" placeholder="Enter your email"><button class="submit-button publication-theme-button" type="submit">Subscribe</button><div class="bottom-links"><span class="privacy">See our <a href="/privacy-policy/">privacy notice</a></span><span class="more-newsletters"><a href="https://communicatoremail.com/F/QrUib2qouODpjCOF~PhHv_/">More newsletters</a></span></div><div class="confirm"><span>Thank you for subscribing</span><span class="bold">We have more newsletters</span><a class="show-more publication-theme-button" href="https://communicatoremail.com/F/QrUib2qouODpjCOF~PhHv_/">Show me</a><span class="privacy">See our <a href="/privacy-policy/">privacy notice</a></span></div><span class="warning">Could not subscribe, try again later</span><span class="invalid">Invalid Email</span></div></form><p>Birmingham faces a thunderstorm warning this week - but, if you fancy getting away, you&apos;re in luck.</p> <p>As the city braces for a deluge of rain, as the Met Office forecasts downpours, you can swap grey skies for beautiful sunsets.</p> <p>Yes, you read that right.</p> <p>You can swap Brum for a Greek island, with Antikythera set to pay families to live there.</p> <p>Situated between Crete and Kythira, the island has a dwindling population with only 24 residents.</p> <p>This increases to 40 over the summer.</p> <p> The residents are primarily aged 50 and over and there are very few children,  <a data-link-tracking="InArticle|Link" href="https://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/whats-on/travel-tourism/antikythera-island-greece-how-apply-16524792">reports Chronicle Live</a> . </p> <div class="embedded-image-grid publication-theme-border" data-mod="grid">
<h4 class="publication-theme-icon publication-theme-border">Read More</h4>
<h3 class="publication-font">Birmingham Airport</h3>
<div class="wrapper">
<ul>
<li data-type="news"><a href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/whats-on/whats-on-news/birmingham-airport-parking-flights-hotels-12940551" target="_self" data-link-tracking="InArticle|Rec|ReadMore|index1|text">

</figure></a></li>
<li data-type="news"><a href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/business/birmingham-airport-unveils-plans-500m-15374870" target="_self" data-link-tracking="InArticle|Rec|ReadMore|index8|text">
<figure>
<div class="mod-image section-theme" data-mod="image">
<img data-src="https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/news/business/article15374799.ece/ALTERNATES/s482b/2_Birmingham-Airport-CGI-2.jpg" alt="CGI of plans for a new departure lounge with mezzanine floor at Birmingham Airport" content="https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/news/business/article15374799.ece/ALTERNATES/s482b/2_Birmingham-Airport-CGI-2.jpg" data-height="321" data-width="482" />
</div>
<figcaption>
How Birmingham Airport will change
</figcaption>
</figure></a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div> <p>In a desperate bid to &quot;revive&quot; the beautiful island, officials on Antikythera have now started a &quot;re-population project&quot; and are on the hunt for families with more than three children to move there.</p> <p>Under the scheme, the authorities will provide each family with a monthly stipend of €500 (£450)and are looking for people who are willing to work as fishermen, stock-farmers, builders or bakers.</p> <p> Speaking to the Greek website  <a href="https://www.iefimerida.gr/news/467112/ta-antikythira-kaloyn-polyteknoys-dinoyn-epidoma-500-eyro-stegi-trofi" rel="nofollow">iefimerida</a> , president of the local council Andreas Harhalakis said that 40 years ago around 300 people lived on the island. </p> <aside class="read-more-links">
<h5 class="publication-theme-icon publication-theme-border">Read More</h5>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/heathrow-gatwick-airport-flight-chaos-16651081" data-image="https://i2-prod.coventrytelegraph.net/incoming/article16651056.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/1_EAY3nIhXoAAdVir.jpg" data-link-tracking="InArticle|Rec|ReadMore|index1|text">Heathrow and Gatwick Airport flight chaos with mass cancellations for travellers after heatwave</a></li>
</ul>
</aside>   <p>He added: &quot;We are looking for many families to &apos;revive&apos; our island.</p> <p>&quot;The specialties of the people we seek are bakers, builders and fishermen.</p> <p>&quot;These people could secure a decent payday in Antikythera.&quot;</p> <aside class="read-more-links">
<h5 class="publication-theme-icon publication-theme-border">Read More</h5>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/urgent-flood-warnings-issued-immediate-16660620" data-image="https://i2-prod.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article10788370.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/JS80922382.jpg" data-link-tracking="InArticle|Rec|ReadMore|index2|text">Urgent flood warnings issued with &apos;immediate action required&apos; as Birmingham and UK face thunderstorms</a></li>
</ul>
</aside>   <p>Antikythera has just one small shop - but it does have electricity and internet connection, so you can stay in touch with friends and family.</p> <p> To find out more or to apply, visit the <a href="https://www.antikythiradirect.com/contact" rel="nofollow"> Antikythira website</a>  or call the local council on +30 2736033004. </p></div><div id="social-follow" <script>
var publicSectionParams = window.TMCONFIG.publicSectionParams;
var environment = 'digitalData.page.attributes.environment'.split('.').reduce(function(acc,cur) { return acc && acc[cur] || undefined; }, window);
if (environment === 'prod' && publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid']) {
(function(h,o,t,j,a,r){
h.hj=h.hj||function()
{(h.hj.q=h.hj.q||[]).push(arguments)}
;
h._hjSettings={hjid:publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid'],hjsv:6};
a=o.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
r=o.createElement('script');r.async=1;
r.src=t+h._hjSettings.hjid+j+h._hjSettings.hjsv;
a.appendChild(r);
})(window,document,'https://static.hotjar.com/c/hotjar-','.js?sv=');
}
</script>
<script>
window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
</script>
</body>
</html>
